results.title: Anti-Diabetic Drugs Inhibit Bulimia Induced Obesity.
results.text_hl: So, combining @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ and Dapgliflozin may be more beneficial for clinical improvement in @<m>DISEASE_Bulimia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002032 @@@bulimia@@@ induced @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obesity@@@.

citations.NLM: Li Z, Jia J, Hao H, Qiao S, Zhang Q, Zhang X, Qi Y, Sun X, Wang K, Gu R, Kang L, Xu B. Anti-Diabetic Drugs Inhibit Bulimia Induced Obesity. Front Biosci (Landmark Ed). 2023 May 22;28(5):97. PMID: 37258466
citations.BibTeX: @article{37258466, title={Anti-Diabetic Drugs Inhibit Bulimia Induced Obesity.}, author={Li Z and Jia J and Hao H and Qiao S and Zhang Q and Zhang X and Qi Y and Sun X and Wang K and Gu R and Kang L and Xu B}, journal={Front Biosci (Landmark Ed)}, volume={28}, number={5}, pages={97}}

results.title: Metformin abuse: A novel and dangerous purging behavior in anorexia nervosa.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: To report a case of severe multisystem illness, near @DISEASE_Death @DISEASE_MESH:D003643 @@@death@@@ and @DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D051437 @@@permanent kidney failure@@@ in a @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ with a history of @DISEASE_Anorexia_Nervosa @DISEASE_MESH:D000856 @@@anorexia nervosa@@@-@<m>DISEASE_Bulimia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002032 @@@binge purge@@@ type due to abuse of prescription @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, an approved oral @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ medication obtained surreptitiously via the internet.

citations.NLM: Geer B, Gibson D, Grayeb D, Benabe J, Victory S, Mehler S, Mehler P. Metformin abuse: A novel and dangerous purging behavior in anorexia nervosa. Int J Eat Disord. 2019 Mar;52(3):319-321. PMID: 30629296
